root.name: Miner Warfare
root.description: MINER WARFARE is a frantic 2D action multiplayer experience. Up to 8 miners dig their way through dirt blocks and other miners to be the wealthiest gold digger at the end of the match! Ten maps, more than twenty weapons and up to 8 players IN LOCAL (yep, 8 players in local), MINER WARFARE is the perfect friendship breaker game!
